Winning Bigger Web Projects

29 April 2009

Barcamp Belfast was a lot of fun. I gave a talk on winning larger web projects to a really engaged, interested audience. It was fantastic.

You might already have seen the video and the slides on the Front site. But for posterity, here they are anyway.

Winning Bigger Web Projects - Paul May - Barcamp Belfast

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
